parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description:
The entity type. Valid values:

*   ip
*   process
*   file

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The data management center of the threat analysis feature. Specify this parameter based on the region in which your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions inside China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the account that you switch from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:
- 0: the current Alibaba Cloud account
- 1: the global account
